content.question: The author italicizes the term “recent” (paragraph 2, sentence 2) primarily to emphasize that the End-Cretaceous mass extinction

choices.label: was less destructive than most people assume
is more relevant than earlier mass extinctions
is not as well documented as earlier mass extinctions
is not as exceptional as its reputation might suggest

content.answer: is not as exceptional as its reputation might suggest

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
